data.text: As a blind person, I've been looking for something that will help me identify products while shopping, I downloaded another scanner and found too many buttons my screen readout couldn't identify. This scanner has only 3 such buttons, when you scan a UPC there are 3 buttons, add to favorites, notes, and copy to clipboard, which are not labeled properly for the screen readout to identify. Making it the best I've found so far.

Excellent App. I've scanned many barcodes with quick, excellent recognition.(tiny, damaged, low contrast, etc.) Of course some of this can be dependent on your phone's capabilities. Ads: There is a small ad strip at the bottom of the screen less than finger's width. Not intrusive or confusing at all. Small popup asks you to rate the app. Press "later" use the app, then rate it at some point. easy. Results: Options to use Google, Amazon, etc. for results. Info results are as good as what is available on the web. Access to your camera and the ability to retrieve results from the web are the ONLY permissions that have been requested by the app. Confusion: MANY of the negative reviews here are based on a different developer's app. This is an excellent app. If I used this kind of utility more often, I'd buy the pro version without hesitation.

With the Pandemic restaurants are slowly reopening. They are unable to pass out old menus. Many places are printing copies & handing them out. The barcode allows a restaurant to have the menu come up on a smartphone. It's simple to install. The app uses the phones camera to take a picture. It's then becomes a .pdf file which can be saved & relabled with the restaurants name. I then created a folder "Restaurant Menu's". I can now order takeout from home & pick it up or use a delivery service.

I just downloaded the app tried to use it once and already popping up to upgrade to the paying version and I declined. When I scanned the QR code I need to find out about because it's from the post office about a letter I'm waiting for, it scans the code and nothing else. Can't click on it, won't open to a new web browser, in fact it does absolutely nothing at all!! Waste of time and all they want you to do is upgrade to the paid version in order for the scanner to properly work!!👎👎👎

works, but takes a while. at first it isn't clear whether it's currently looking for a QR code or whether I need to do something to trigger it, I tweaked the scan box several times and opened and closed the settings menu before it finally recognized the code. This is when lighting and focus were pretty good. But this scanner eventually succeeds where other scanners fail.

After downloading this app, I spent time using the features it offers and I was actually very surprised that it exceeded all of the great reviews it has gotten! I was so skeptical of all the excellent reviews that were so equally complimentary, that I was somehow morphing into a conspiracy theorist! After I spent the time trying to prove it was a marketing set-up, I happily felt like a fool, because they were correct with this one!! It is truly awesome compared to any other one I've used!

I had to uninstall this app after an event where I scanned different qr codes, but the app would no longer allow me to access the links, stating that i would have to pay to use the app. I have had this app for years, and have never occured this problem until recently. I actually reallly liked it, and had reccomended the app to other android users. I can no longer say that with any confidence.

Didn't scan squat, but did manage to ask me to rate before it actually did anything. I've used scanners, that immediately detect - end of story. Deleted. In response to developer: as you can see from my original comment, I didn't have a successful scan. So according to you, the app shouldn't have been requesting a rating. Bottomline, the app didn't scan, didn't work.
data.replyText: The app only asks for a rating, if you had at least one successful scan.

data.text: Finally, a free app that doesn't need credit card details. It did exactly what I needed. Mostly because I didn't click an ad. A warning for all. Be careful of the ads on the bottom. Had a similar ad on other apps that has a START button, which takes you to a credit card page. I might have been a little harsh on the first 4 apps I tested. But I doubt that.

If you use this app, go adverts free or be very careful and do not click on any adverts. While scanning, by mistake I clicked on the adware browsecontent (that cannot be contacted) that costed me £££ and I had to cancel my debit card. I reported UK National Fraud and Cyber Crime Reporting Centre and the developer TeaCapps. The developer came back to me very quickly and assured me that they requested Google to block them.

I can't use app without consenting for a third party cookies. I don't mind ads in general. Please fix so that users could use this app with general ads. If that is not possible, at least let users to access history so they could copy/transfer it elsewhere.

The best Bluetooth Connect application. It is excellent, clear and also fast. It has an easy and simple interface to use and smooth performance. I would like to thank the developers for this application. I recommend it.
I am still exploring the potentials of this QR Scanner. I have tried several, and only this one seem to be genuine. so far, it is awesome to use, especially in creating a QR code.

I've never once had a complaint for this app, apart from once but that most likely was due to the thing I was scanning being a poorly made website. this app in my experience is perfect and I highly recommend.

I just wanted to quickly install Netflix on my TV installed the first QrReader listed. Slow sooo slow ! Ads and more ads agree to this now agree to that. Now promis me your first born.. sorry but what? I just wanted to watch TV and sit on my couch. It takes too long - way to long. I rather use my tv remote to type the email and password. Thanks!
Easy and quick. Just make sure u click the address/link on Top of the resulting scan. The advertisement in the middle of the page, could possibly confuse some.
Best kept secret that needs to get out. These guys a Country Wide Auto Salvage are great! They handle new and used parts along with a garage in tandem. It is now my go to place . Doug Borgstrom

You follow the 1st page of the app, that says 'start' and it's an advert link. It's for something you wouldn't ever use, like truck vehicle logistics. The ad link is bigger than the actual opening, to use the app. Shouldn't it be the other way around. The ads, now, are more prominent than the actual app and interfere with its use.
I used to love it but now if you do not consent to venders sending you ads you can't move forward. QR/ Ad app.
Be careful it is SCAM. Their advertising is fraud. They will let you click in their advertising by accident registered (instead of what you want) and then gradually withdraw money from your account.

Freddy was our waiter, he definitely made our experience memorable with exceptional service and loads of character! The food was absolutely delish and the painting was harder than it looks but so much fun!
This application is REALLY WELL DONE. I love that it identifies the symbologies. Another nice feature is that it is capable of also GENERATING bar codes as PNG graphic files.
I opted for free version, and it doesn't allow me to use camera, unless I select pro version. This app pushes me to buy the app subscription. No, not for me. Aww
amazing app, it added to you android functions. I have a problem with my device that can't read qr code while using another app qr reader but the problem is solve when I install this
Excellent app that is simple to use and it's great to have QR codes in a history file if you need them later.
i do understand, why ads, but i don't get for what reason personalized ads are being forced. Definitely i would not use app which is forcing personalized ads.

Terrible app, encourages scams. Like other users, I was misled by an ad, thinking I was creating an account to pay a hospital bill but in actuality I was sending money to a scam outfit in Philippines. A Google search says it is impossible to undo the scam, Fraavy. I had to cancel my credit card to quit it. QR Code Reader could make the ads less prominent. They could delete the big, bright green button that says CONTINUE. But no. They want you to be ripped off. Avoid!

Works as intended. I use it for work as I handle assets both receiving and deployment. Great when I'm in the field as I need to keep track of tags and serial numbers. I've recommended this app to my co-workers. Suggestion: have a grouping option so that multiple scans can be related (i.e.: I have an asset tag and the asset's serial number which needs to be reported in the Asset Management System to be assigned to a client) outside of that, this is a great app
Pathetic, no free use At All, Insisted on cookies for personalised advertising. Cannot use or recommend, deleting the time wasting rubbish now.
Visited for a date night. Food, venue and service was very good. No one rushed anything and we could enjoy the evening!

I love Amazon Smile. As a kindergarten teacher, the convenience of finding what I need and often being able to receive my purchases the same day or overnight is a game changer! Also, the few times that I have contacted the customer service representatives, they have been helpful and courteous. So, 5 stars!!!!
this app helps me out a lot. it helps me out with work schedules. I do use it very often. it is a good app to use
Hi, I paid to upgrade to Pro but the app has not upgraded as I don't have the functions and still displays adverts. I sent an email for assistance. Can you please assist. Many thanks
This works very well. Just scan and it turns on your credit card... t tell you the r price of something And where to get it. It does lots of things with the trouble iof install
The fact you wont let me you use the app unless i agree to give you access to my phone, shows how intrusive and illegal you've become, i wouldn't give you one star if i could
This application is very useful. It helps me with my schoolwork or when I eat in restaurants. Thank you for this wonderful application🎀
Nice photographers, presentation, friendly servers. Some of the shakes tho
please offer more Body conditioning classes, they are very good
When a q r code scanner asks me if I want to pay for a subscription. It's also didn't let me just open up the Don't link

JAX NAS NEX was clean, spacious, and well lit. Employees were friendly, courteous, and very helpful. Restrooms were also clean and well cared for. At check out, Sal was friendly, fast, and very helpful! He made sure the discounts were on the clearance items!! Thank you for all you do!!
Bad tried to use it to read a qr code. Did not work! This app does not do what is advertised.
Aidan was extremely helpful, listened to all my queries and gave good comprehensive explanations..

Great app. lt works very well and reads many formats very fast. The only thing annoying is that after choosing the history sharing method, it do not let you change it. In other words, after selecting to share the scan history through whatsapp or e-mail, for example, the next time you share, it brings the same sharing option without asking which one you want.
Leighton was lovely and friendly. very helpful. and clearly knows how to run a store.

bad service, staff busy in displaying his product and returned 3 customer by saying that come after 30 minutes, such an idiotic staff can bring sales to zero in this competitive environment at airport where there are other vendor also not only urs. 2 customers wanted to buy a water and the third one coffee
This app works every time. I have no complaints, I am happy with this app.
BEWARE OF ADVERT SCAMS. The APP itself is good but beware of the large START button which can lead you into a scam purchase. I have reported to Google Play.
great bike, fast. well built. lots of colors to choose from as long as you pick flat black....lol
Yes you can scann how much it is and see the barcode it's cool. Download it now it so sos so cool 🙏🙏🙏
Fast and accurate capture. Makes returning items easy to scan QR codes and take to UPS for processing.
Gearge and Carlos were great. Tje experience was excellent!
Hardly scans anything and when it does it doesn't get it right

When I used this app to make a appointment with ICBC it led me to a website claiming to be stellar and asking for my info credit card number and claiming that my card won't get charged it was just supposed to be subscription and then charged me 69.25 without my permission
PALS course was conducted flawlessly.Instructor was very professional and courteous. Highly recommended

Best QR and barcode reader I've used, and I've tried several. Works with many formats which are documented in the app help pages. Able to use the camera or input an image already on the phone. Quick read times on scanning. Stores a history of scans which is easy to share. Also you can create QR/barcodes of your own. Stylish app which is easy to use and well thought out. I've just been using the free version for a few months but am now buying the premium version to support the developer.
Good app, ads aren't too intrusive on free version. Scans a good range of 2d matrix codes, very useful app if that's what you're looking for!

Really a good scanner with a ton of useful features, mainly I liked the zoom feature a lot because whenever I get close to the barcode it goes out of focus but by zooming in I can prevent that, the barcode creation feature is also one very good thing...It detects most of the barcodes, can scan images too of course, saves history too, does the job perfectly, the pro version is also really affordable but I personally use adguard dns to get rid of ads, so I'm not concerned 'bout ads...No issue!
Work OK but now sends me round in circles as I don't want the pro version and will not accept cookies! By by this app!
Been using this app for a few years now. Never have had a single problem. Excellent job.
Delicious Kebap!! The blend of all sauces and veggies and chicken schmeckt incredible :). Must Visit!!
Nice app... Simple and lightweight and functional.
Yes,The app is great but it will take some time to scan the qr code
Quick and accurate, best barcode reading app I've tried!
Straight forward and easy to use. Ads aren't to much of a bother.
My scanner all of a sudden stopped working saying I QR Code scanner deactivated.
great place!! great service! I really enjoy it highly recommended

This is actually a nice app. I already had scanning apps installed but none of them were able to also scan pictures containing barcodes. The app is easy to use and just concentrates on what it should do. I like that the user can save the scanned code as a png-file Or as a PDF-file. The app gives a lot of options on how to proceed with the scanning result. I really like it. There is another app "QRbot" from the same company but I couldn't figure out the difference yet.Edit: just read the apps FAQ - they are technically the same....
works perfectly. No ads
Very good. Better than the lightning qr. Which couldn't even scan stored images.

Good experience in every way. The only negative was thinking the car would be 100% ready for us to drive back home (74 miles away) instead of returning another day to finish up details. But a very pleasant dealership overall. We'd buy another car from them without hesitation. Thank you
Doesnt work properly, it flips the photos I want to scan and doesnt even let you zoom in or out of the image making it dificult to use
From the reception to the optometrists, it was easy breezy. They make you feel at home and at ease. I highly recommend them for your routine eye tests and glasses acquisition. You won't regret it.

I had an amazing time at this hotel. Staff was absolutely wonderful and very helpful and polite a special thank you for all your hospitality to krishan, Sagar, Asim, Ajay, Venkanna, and Rinku, Geeta. they were all absolutely good and gave very good service. I would highly recommend this hotel to everyone.

Easy, simple, and does its job wonderfully!! It isn't filled to the brim with distracting (and destructive) ads, and doesn't bs you with a 'buy the pReMiUm subscription or else you can only use this app three times per day' or anything of the sort. It loads fast too, so during a time like this, when scanning codes to sign yourself in before being able to enter a place is required 24/7, this is super helpful. Thanks for making such a handy app!!!
It's a very good scanner app I have ever seen. Quick scanning and smooth running of the app in compared to other scanner apps.
it's qr scanner that works better than all the others.
prompted to review. blocked me from working. had to set down network gear to clear this popup. app works fine. no fill screen ads
Perfect scanner that works ever time.

This is a very functional App for scanning AND creation of 1D & 2D barcodes. It will scan from codes and a screen and has a Zoom and Torch facility. The codes and scans are saved too. It just works well. You can convert one code to another type. I have been labeling with 2D codes, it is great that the codes are either read perfectly or not at all, no mistakes or errors. The resulting codes, when printed with a laser printer can be much smaller that the text would be and yet are still read O.K.
it is great. I think it is know more than scanning
$50 a month and I have no idea what it is! It took me to a website that wanted me to have a 5 day trial and then it bills monthly. What it does I have no idea!
Allie did an amazing job and was really nice and helpful.

Love the app and how versatile it is to scan a variety of different bar codes. Features like continuously scanning or vise-versa, turning on confirmation of scan when different bar codes come into view are a god-send. Being able to share different barcodes as contacts or wifi details are amazing as well. Scanning is super fast and consistently reliable. Purchasing the PRO version is well worth the cost. The only con I've come across (and not a whole lot of barcode scanners have this) is there is no ability to POST the barcode to an arbitrary url for automation purposes. It certainly lets you execute a GET call with the contents of the barcode as a parameter in the URL, but some barcodes (esp. QR codes) can have data not befitting a url parameter. Adding the option to send this data as the body of a POST call would be enough to avoid switching to another app.

Beeeeest QR skanner! I used only there of them (this app another one and on the phone) but I don't need more bc this one is awesome for sure! You can scan it with light, from picture... And it shows you password from Wi-Fi, you can copy only it, not all the info (name, password and stuff). You can scan phone's contact, app will allow you to copy only number, not all info you don't need. Just awesome, really! Thanks.

Great app with minimum ads, one doesn't pop up every second the app is used. Gives correct information for most items depending on the barcode. Some say they are tracking numbers instead of an item. Best barcode and QR reader on Google Play in my opinion and also gives the ability to create QR codes. premium membership is available but does not limit the functionality of the app. Only a few things require premium membership. Thanks for making a great app!
Good quality bar set at a very affordable price.

this store was a good experience. we went to 3 different stores and this is the only one that was about to get my son a bedroom set. not what we wanted but he looked out and made sure we got something. we drove all the way from NEW JERSEY and he made sure we left with something. Thank you.

The only app in the whole store thats actually good... has many features and you can scan codes from your own phone gallery, can make codes too. Vey good, Ive only ever encountered one error and when i mentioned it to this apps email i got a reply very quickly and very professional. If you are looking for an app because you dont have feature on your camera i 100% reccomend this, have had it for over 7 months now. Has no ads except for the popup (clean)at the bottom, which has NEVER got in my way
It works very fast and it opens the Web page from the QR code immediately without needing for any interaction.
Works for what it's for without full screen ads and that's really all I can ask for in an app.
Very useful, especially the history option.

tayler was exceptional, her smile brightened the room. she was very informative about the menu and her recommendation for the Tiramisu French toast was perfect! it was so Delicious! we will definitely be back.
Very bad app...you will be lost in advertisement and finally will end up with uninstall action.
NOPE👎... If I wanted to use my own camera, then WHY would I download your APP as well?... And that's just one of the many problems with this APP👎

Best scanner reader lookup and ability to make your own BARCODES from your own products it's very easy to learn has multiple functions and ability, very accurate and scans the information and reads it with in minutes. It's a must try for anyone who is curious or has a ONLINE store that ships and tracks products supplies or mail it is great if you have to do digital marketing supplies PRODUCTS and labels. I love this app
The app actually works. It's not like other apps that scan the QR code and give you nothing. This one actually gives you a link to take you the thing you want to see.

Big thanks to the developers. I had a photo of a QR code containing all my Google Authenticator backup codes. After wiping my phone, the backup QR could not be imported and I was locked out of everything! I think the photo was too blurry. This app allowed me to open the photo as a file and save it as a new, unblurred QR code, which I was then able to scan and import! Not quite sure how the app pulled this off, but it did and I am very grateful! Thanks all :)

Versatile and convenient, this handy app sticks to your quick settings bar. Ads are practically nonexistent, only appearing occasionally on the bottom bar. Can scan quickly and a variety of different code types ranging from a barcode all the way to QR! It's really good, but could always be better. 8/10

The Zip lining adventure started with the friendly instructors Zuma and Nkosi they were great and reassured you that you will have the best time ever. The overall experience a must to to if you adrenaline junkie. 🤗🤗🤗😊😊😊👌👌thank you guys great , fantastic job 🙏🙏🙏🙏
So excited about Piper Arms opening up in Brantford. The food was awesome and the service was excellent. Everyone was very friendly 😁
